name: Trump Speech Editor
body:
### Introduction Trump Speech Editor is a javascript project that allows you to mute sections of a youtube video. [Click here to Start](http://marciojmo.github.io/trump-speech-editor/editor.html). [Click here to see a working example](https://marciojmo.github.io/trump-speech-editor/view.html?v=tLSy8Tl2bjs&i=34,56;73,82;). I've created this project because of this tweet:

Someone should try editing a video of Trump speaking and removing the sound whenever he's saying something false.

â€” Paul Graham (@paulg) August 14, 2016
Paul is one of my top influencers. ### The Editor The editor allows you to select sections of a YouTube video and generate a URL to visualize the video with the selected sections silenced. ### The Viewer The viewer is responsible for playing the video and for controling the video's volume. It receives a video_id and a list of non overlaping, ordered, time intervals to mute.

### Know Bugs - The editor is not checking if the id provided by the user is a valid Youtube video id. - The player is not handling when the user moves the video forward or rewind it. - If the list of intervals to mute is unordered or overlaped the viewer may not work. ### Support & Contributions - Handle forward/rewind. - Integrate with a URL shortener. - Integrate with a speech recognition system and train a Neural Network to auto-mute Trump's sophist sentences. hahaha
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
